channel.title: Can someone help me with adding shops and monsters
channel.description:
hi can someone give me some shop and monster codes and where to put them thanks very much Posted on: December 30, 2006, 08:48:50 PM -------------------------------------------------------------------------------- I need a barrows shop and for monsters i need black and steel dragon
and where do they go

item.title: Can someone help me with adding shops and monsters
item.dc:creator: @Hell_Hound_0516 Hell Hound 0516
item.description:
@Hell_Hound_0516 wrote:

adding monsters is quite simple, open autospawn.cgf and at the bottom you will see [end of spawn list] right before that write:

spawn = (NPC ID) XCoord YCoord Height (if its just on the ground put 0, if it like on the second floor of a house put 1 etc.) Range1X Range1Y Range2X Range2Y Rage= how far they may walk or move) There walk type ( just put 2 for people, 1 for Monsters) and a discribtion ;D

Hope that helped ;D

Read full topic
item.source: Can someone help me with adding shops and monsters
